author: Danny Walker
title: Coleen Nolan gets down and dirty in Celebrity Big Brother as she gives Calum Best 'sexy' lap dance
text:
TV Coleen Nolan gets down and dirty in Celebrity Big Brother as she gives Calum Best 'sexy' lap dance Big Brother asked the Loose Women star to perform a sexy lap dance to the guy she finds the most attractive Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Coleen Nolan leads the house in a row over water with SPEIDI Share this video Get celebs   Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Coleen Nolan got down and dirty in Celebrity Big Brother when the housemates played Dares. 
The Loose Women star has already confessed to her fellow CBB stars that she's having a bit of a 'midlife crisis' but now it seems the 51-year-old is letting her hair down. 
In scenes which air tonight, viewers will see housemates in the living area playing games. 
When it comes to Coleen's turn, it's revealed that she must perform a sexy lap dance to the housemate she finds the most attractive... which ends up being Calum Best . And there it is (Photo: Channel 5) Yep, this has actually happened (Photo: Channel 5) 
After finding out her task, Coleen sashayed over to Calum and performed the raunchy dance for him. 
As things get steamy all of the housemates cheer them on. 
We wonder what her Loose Women co-stars will say? Collen has been a great housemate so far (Photo: Channel 5) It's all going off in tonight's show (Photo: Channel 5) Read More 
Coleen is reportedly using her time on Celebrity Big Brother as a trial separation from her partner of 17 years Ray. 
Tellingly, when she walked into the house on Tuesday, the star was not wearing her wedding ring. Coleen and her husband, Ray (Photo: PA) 
Loose Women worried for 'vulnerable' Coleen Nolan in Celebrity Big Brother as marriage breaks down 
Coleen's Loose Women co-stars revealed they were concerned about her re-entering the house. 
Nadia Sawalha, who has been on CBB before, confessed she is worried about her pal being under such intense scrutiny, while going through relationship issues. 
She said: “They isolate you for 36 hours, and then send you out and everything becomes very serious. 
“You’re in a goldfish bowl, with extreme lights on you 24/7. When you feel like you’re going crazy, they take you into a white room and tell you you’re not crazy. 
“I worry with all the stuff going on it’s too magnified for her. It will be tough for her.” 
* Celebrity Big Brother returns at 9pm on Channel 5 Like us on Facebook
